item.title: Donator Item Help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

Hi im having trouble with my donator items. When i put the item donator only it works but when a person thats a donator trys to use the item it says you must be donator to use this item here is how my thing works for the requrements.
c.attackLevelReq = c.defenceLevelReq = c.strengthLevelReq = c.rangeLevelReq = c.magicLevelReq = c.Donatorreq = 0;
and here is an example of how the rest of them look:
if (itemName.contains(“infinity”)) {
c.magicLevelReq = 50;
c.defenceLevelReq = 25;
}
Please help me fix it.

Read full topic
